hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.
